scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a figure, likely a prophet or saint, standing and holding a staff in their left hand. The figure is draped in flowing robes and wears a hood. In their right hand, they hold a scroll with text, and their gaze is directed upwards. The scene is framed by architectural elements, suggesting an interior or a niche. The overall style is that of a woodcut or engraving, common in medieval manuscripts.
